description: UMD 3.14.3 is a revision update of the third Major release of UMD. In particular, this releases a package (umd-release) that fixes a problem with RPM signature keys.
releaseNotes: This release contains the following products: umd-release (other capabilities).<br>
installationNotes: All products in UMD 3.14.3 were verified against EGI's current Quality Criteria. Installation and configuration notes are available in the EGI repository.
contact: For further information about the UMD, its goals and surrounding processes, and more information about how to engage as a Technology Provider with EGI, please send an Email to: cto (at) egi.eu.
technicalContact: For any bugs and issues you encounter that are not described in the release notes of this UMD release, or the related documentation provided by the Technology Providers, please visit the EGI Helpdesk (<a href="https://ggus.eu/">https://ggus.eu/</a>) to make a report.
knownIssues: Please, visit https://wiki.egi.eu/wiki/UMD-3:UMD-3.14.3 for known issues.
changeLog: This release includes a new umd-release package for SL6.

products.name: umd.umd-release
products.description: umd repository configuration that adds all missing repositories that are needed for the installation of UMD products and configures yum priorities
